text.section: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, on written request to a local law enforcement unit, the unit shall send to the person who submitted the request one copy of the registration statement of each registrant on record with the unit.

A request under subsection (a) of this section shall contain:
the name and address of the person who submits the request; and
the reason for the request.
A local law enforcement unit shall keep records of all written requests received under subsection (a) of this section.
